body: Login failed at the service you tried to access. Please see below for possible reasons and actions.
The service that you tried to access did not get all required attributes for identification and/or personalization.
This may be because KTH does not have this information or that the log in service at KTH is not configured to release those attributes to the service you tried to access.

Please contact KTH IT-support and include the name of the service you tried to access, any missing attributes if you know what they are (the service may have informed you) and, if possible, a screenshot of the error message at the service (including the address bar at the top of the web browser) and also of this message.
The service you tried to access failed during the authentication stage.
This may be because it requires additional steps which did not occur during login (such as using a second factor). Please try again.

If you cannot resolve the issue yourself, please contact KTH IT-Support and include the name of the service you tried to access, any error information given by the service and, if possible, a screenshot of the error message at the service (including the address bar at the top of the web browser) and also of this message.
The service that you tried to access requires privileges that you do not have.
Typical requirements include:
A confirmed user account, or "high" identity assurance level (AL)
Affiliation
Some specific entitlements

If you think you should have access, please contact KTH IT-Support and include the name of the service you tried to access, any privileges that were noted as missing and, if possible, a screenshot of the error message at the service (including the address bar at the top of the web browser) and also of this message.
The service you tried to access requires a verified user account, also known as SWAMID AL3.
KTH is currently not an authorized provider of SWAMID AL3. Please contact KTH IT-Support or try another identity provider, such as eduID Sweden.
The service you tried to access requires a confirmed user account, also known as SWAMID AL2.
Please read the instructions under "What does this mean for you?" on Upgraded assurance level on Ladok login.

context.header: SWAMID base level user account required
body: The service you tried to access requires a user account fulfulling the base level of SWAMID, also known as SWAMID AL1.
All accounts at KTH fulfills AL1.

Please contact KTH IT-Support and include the name of the service you tried to access, any error information given by the service and, if possible, a screenshot of the error message at the service (including the address bar at the top of the web browser) and also of this message.
An error occurred when accessing the service.

If you think you should be able to access the service, please contact KTH IT-Support and include the name of the service you tried to access, any error information given by the service and, if possible, a screenshot of the error message at the service (including the address bar at the top of the web browser) and also of this message.
